Package maze

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Maze
    Maze class to provide the representation of the maze
    Tile
    Tile class that represents one space within a maze
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    Maze.Direction
    Provides a representation of the four cardinal directions
    Tile.Type
    Provides a representation of all the different tile types
  • Exception Summary
    Exception Description
    InvalidMazeException
    An InvalidMazeException indicates that a maze is invalid
    MultipleEntranceException
    A MultipleEntranceException is thrown when there are Multiple Entrance tiles in a maze
    MultipleExitException
    A MultipleExitException is thrown when there are Multiple Exit tiles in a maze
    NoEntranceException
    A NoEntranceException is thrown when there are no entrance tiles in a maze
    NoExitException
    A NoExitException is thrown when there are no Exit tiles in a maze
    RaggedMazeException
    A RaggedMazeException is thrown when each row of a maze do not have the same nunber of tiles
